issue.title: [Rust] Document our approach to unsafe code in README
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10889](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10889). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be helpful to document the project's stance on the use of unsafe code in a prominent location such as in the top-level README so that we can refer people to this when questions are asked about this.
